title: Laying Claim to the Soul
description: Everyone wants adventure in their lives, except Tabatha. She just wants a normal life. Instead, Tabby has someone trying to kill her and everything she loves. And she has attracted the attention of three supernatural males â€“ a wolf shifter, a demon man, and a dragon-alien enforcer who patrols the alternate worlds that Tabby had no idea were even out there. And they all want to marry her.  Then there is the fact that one of her best friends is some kind of god with way too much power.  Yea, normal would be nice.
author: Trinity Blacio
